paragraphs.title: 转换函数
paragraphs.text:
import tushare as ts
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib as mpl
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

StockCode = '300036'

# 通用转换，pandas.DataFrame到Table格式。
def df2tabx(pdfx):
    strTab ="%table\r"
    for icol in pdfx.columns:
        strTab = strTab + icol + "\t"
    strTab = strTab + "\r"
    
    #     
    for idx in pdfx.index:
        for icol in pdfx.columns:
            strTab = strTab + str(pdfx.ix[idx][icol]) + "\t"
        strTab = strTab + '\r'
    return strTab

# 获取单个股东股份变化数据。
def get_byholder(holder):
    dff = data_holders[(data_holders['name']==(holder))].sort_values('quarter', ascending=True)
    return df2tabx(dff)

paragraphs.title: 获取数据-前十大流通股东
paragraphs.text:
# df_holders为季度统计摘要，data_holders为前十大持股明细统计
df_holders, data_holders = ts.top10_holders(code=StockCode, gdtype='1') #gdtype等于1时表示流通股，默认为0 
#df_holders, data_holders = ts.top10_holders(code=StockCode) #gdtype等于1时表示流通股，默认为0 

df_holders = df_holders.sort_values('quarter', ascending=True)
